Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0408 affecting package xorg-x11-server for versions less than 1.20.10-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0408 affecting package xorg-x11-server for versions less than 1.20.10-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package xorg-x11-server is earlier than 1.20.10-14, affected by CVE-2024-0408
